data.title: Queen Paola: Picture Thread Part One
data.meta_description: I think she still is, after all, she's 66 now, so and still looking very good for her age!

12/04/2003. Queen Paola of Belgium inaugurates the new wing of the ancient art museum of Brussels © Bert van den Broucke / Photo News / Gamma 748838

Queen Paola and King Albert 12/18/2003. Christmas concert at the Palace of Brussels with the royal family of Belgium. © DEMARET RAPAHEL/PHOTO NEWS/GAMMA / IBL Bildbyrå 749538

10/15/2003. Queen Paola and King Albert of Belgium visit the monastery of Rila in Bulgaria. © Didier Lebrun / Photo News / Gamma 745642

King Albert of Belgium and Bulgarian President Georgi Parvanov 10/14/2003. Official visit of King and queen of Belgium in Bulgaria. © Danny Gys / Photo NEws / Gamma 745581

Queen Paola, Princess Mathilde and King Albert 07/21/2003. 10th anniversary of King Albert II's reign: military parade © GYS DANNY/PHOTO NEWS/GAMMA 740926

07/08/2003. Queen Paola visits Hooidonk center in Zandhoven. © LEBRUN DIDIER/PHOTO NEWS/GAMMA 740159

06/04/2003. Queen Paola delivers the "Queen Paola Awards 2003" to kindergarten and primary school teachers. © Didier Lebrun / Photo News / Gamma 738010

05/20/2003. King Harald of Norway and Queen Sonja visit to Belgium Queen Paola, King Harald, Queen Sonja and King Albert © Didier Lebrun / Photo News / gamma 737067

King Albert and queen Paola 04/12/2003. Wedding of PrinceLaurent of Belgium with ClaireCoombs: Religious ceremony at the cathedral Saint-Michel of Brussels © Gys-Lebrun / Photo News / Gamma 734762

Originally posted by Hannelore@May 2nd, 2004 - 9:30 am

Paola and Albert in the seventies

http://meta2.fotomarktplatz.de/image/layou...-02-05-1537.jpg

Paola is so beautiful in this photo ~ and, her dress is quite gorgeous. It might be labeled as "vintage". Growing up, marriage and "all" which goes with it, having children ~ AND, ALL of which goes with THAT, can age any beautiful woman ... but, I feel the love she shares with her husband, (who has been in the not-so-good-news-lately), and the success of their children can be very rewarding. To me, she looks as though she has a "tender heart".

Elizajane

Albert & Poala pics are gorgeous ,they realy seam in love.did they had arranged marriage or it was a love story?

Hannelore

Heir Presumptive

Joined

Dec 25, 2003

Messages

2,571

City

Bruges

Country

Belgium

They were very much in love when they married, it certainly wasn't arranged. But after some years, there was a crisis in their marriage. Prince Albert was very often abroad with economic missions (like Filip today), while Paola stayed at home with the children.

They became estranged from each other (this is also the reason why Mathilde always accompanies Filip!). they both had several lovers, and Albert even had a child with another woman. They were planning a divorce, but eventually got back together through faith (it's said that princess Astrid introduced them to the charismatic movement, but I don't know if this is true).

Now you can see they still love each other vey much. I think it's very nice they never divorced and were able to solve their problems after so many years!

They were planning a divorce, but eventually got back together through faith (it's said that princess Astrid introduced them to the charismatic movement, but I don't know if this is true).

The charismatic movement is the name of a movement within the church of Rome.

Wow amazing!!! she was really a very beautiful woman... she look very much like one of the famous actresses of that time like Brigitte Bardot or Claudia Cardinale...

And she still is very beautiful... she is already 67 years old, and not much woman do look so fantastic at this age... look at Queen Fabiola, who is somewhere around 75 and looks like someone of over 100....

I've read a book about Paola, it's called "Paola, van La Dolce Vita tot Koningin. (Paola, from Dolce Vita to Queen). There are some very interesting facts about her:

she once was refused to enter the St. Peter in Rome by wearing a miniskirt. And during a party in 1963 when the death of JFK was announced, she said: "Dommage, pour une fois oú l'on s'amusait bien." . She almost caused a diplomatic scandal...

And also, in the book there was something about her secret relation with singer Salvator Adamo, who wrote the song 'Dolce Paola' about the young princess...
